name: Testspeed
giudizio2:
You really thought I wouldn't interject during such an important event?
How cute.\|\.
giudizio3: The crowd is absurdly adorable today. I would blow a kiss if I had the animation for it!
giudizio4: But now let's continue as usual. And since ya' all seem to be on a tight schedule to speed them all...
giudizio5: ..it seems only fitting to send you in the speedrun minigame. Many hearts for everyone!
